post.body: ...anymore
how stunted and small i was living here. i love my apartment, i love my roommate. i love my family but even this town doesn't feel like home
i miss my queen sized bed lol, i miss my apartment. sitting on this twin bed in my old room, which is now my nephew's playroom, reminds me..
i seriously have the best boyfriend ever. i must have been good in a past life
yes, i am still at work.
i.need.lip.chap.now.
ugh no longer in a good mood. will a good sport just fucking move into my house and pay rent
they freed the dog and there was no fire, our alarm set off the other ones. also shocker, no drugs upstairs!
"damnit you said it outloud first!"
hot fireman and cute policeman, boy what an exciting night
i am suchhh an asshole
i hate the holidays. im ready for new years already
getting our christmas tree!
why wont this mouse leave me alone!?
im writing! im writing! im writing!
you attack my central nervous system
i feel like you were made for me and sucks because you live in a bubble called la
i miss having a really great guy friend
i think my writers block is gone!!!!
never drink 5 cups of coffee in a row AND stay up all night and get 4 hours of sleep. end result is not pretty
